title: Historian on the Moral Majority - context

content.question: The excerpt most directly reflects which change in United States society during the 1970s and 1980s?

choices.label: The widespread closing of public schools
An increase in the number of traditional nuclear families
The rise of political activism among evangelicals
The emergence of a youth-based counterculture

content.answer: The rise of political activism among evangelicals

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
